feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Windows 11 Notification Center Styler 1.1.6
entry.content:
• Updated the 10JumpLists theme.
  • Empty visual states can now be targeted, can be useful in cases when there's no active visual state.

entry.title: Bring Back the Borders! 3.1.1
entry.content: Full rewrite of the mod.

entry.title: Disable Taskbar Thumbnails 1.1.2
entry.content:
• Fixed support for the new thumbnail previews implementation on Windows 11 version 23H2.
  • Fixed the list mode for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows 11.

entry.title: Taskbar auto-hide speed 1.0
entry.content:
Taskbar auto-hide speed

Customize the taskbar auto-hide speed and frame rate to make it feel less sluggish and janky.

entry.title: Taskbar auto-hide when maximized 1.2
entry.content:
• It's no longer necessary to enable auto-hide in the taskbar properties for the mod to work, the mod does that automatically.
  • Added an option to apply the auto-hide logic only to foreground window.
  • Added an option to exclude programs from the auto-hide logic, can be useful for programs which act as taskbar widgets or for buggy programs.
  • Added an option to apply the mod only to the primary monitor taskbar.
  • The "Auto-hide only when a window is maximized" mode was improved to hide the taskbar for fullscreen windows and snapped windows as well.

entry.title: Windows 11 Taskbar Styler 1.3.10
entry.content:
• Improved support for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows 11 for the following themes: WinXP, TranslucentTaskbar, Squircle, RosePine, DockLike, CleanSlate, Lucent.
  • Fixed customizing the FontWeight property for some controls.

entry.title: Cycle taskbar buttons with mouse wheel 1.1.7
entry.content:
• Added support for Windows 10.
  • Added support for the ExplorerPatcher taskbar.
  • Fixed keyboard shortcut registering on startup in some cases.

entry.title: Better file sizes in Explorer details 1.4.8
entry.content:
• Fixed "Everything" 1.5.0.1384a or newer hanging when browsing for files in "Everything" itself using the system dialog.
  • Fixed the "Use IEC terms" option not working if "Use MB/GB for large files" is disabled.
  • Fixed size not shown for empty OneDrive folders (and possibly other non-standard folders).

entry.title: Disable Taskbar Thumbnails 1.1.1
entry.content: • Fixed dragging a file over a taskbar button not switching to the relevant window.

entry.title: Taskbar Thumbnail Reorder 1.1.1
entry.content: • Fixed support for Windows 11 version 23H2, as well as several other older Windows versions.

entry.title: Explorerframe fixes for Win11 22H2+ 1.0.1
entry.content: Explorerframe fixes for win11: more workarounds for unpredictable menubar appearance on later 23H2 and 24H2 builds

entry.title: Taskbar Thumbnail Reorder 1.1
entry.content:
• Added support for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows 11.
  • Added support for the ExplorerPatcher taskbar.

entry.title: Icons of Win16 apps in Explorer 1.0.2
entry.content: Add license tag according to the license on the original code.

entry.title: Disk Pie Chart 1.0.0
entry.content:
Disk Pie Chart

Since Windows 10, the usage chart in the disk properties window was changed to a blue circle rather than a pie chart, like previous Windows versions. This mod changes it back to the classic pie chart.

Preview:

Preview (classic):

entry.title: Native titelebars in Chromium-based browsers 0.1.1
entry.content: Fix description

entry.title: Disable Taskbar Thumbnails 1.1
entry.content:
• Added support for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows 11.
  • Added support for the ExplorerPatcher taskbar.

entry.title: Taskbar minimize/restore on scroll 1.1.1
entry.content: • The aero peek effect is now canceled when scrolling over thumbnails (for the new thumbnail previews implementation in Windows 11).

entry.title: Spoof Light/Dark Theme 1.0.1
entry.content: • Fix issue with RegQueryValueExW hook

entry.title: Restore Button Pulse Animation 1.0.0
entry.content:
Restore Button Pulse Animation

In Windows Vista and 7, buttons played a "pulse" animation when they were focused. This mod restores that functionality.

Note

While the theme state for the pulse animation still exists in Windows 8 and 10 to accomodate third party applications that custom draw controls, the images in the default theme are identical, and you will not see an animation. Make sure you're using a Windows Vista/7-styled theme in order to see the effect.

entry.title: Native titelebars in Chromium-based browsers 0.1
entry.content: This is a variation of the Chromium Frame Blackout Fix mod by Ingan121. Ingan121 is maybe currently working on a better mod, so this mod is an interim solution. The difference from the original mod is in intercepting also WMNCCALCSIZE in addition to WMNCPAINT message. Since the effect of this mod is unpredictable on other applications, by default only some Chromium-based browsers are injected.
